content: Hello, Stephanie! Today, let's talk about hobbies and personal interests. What do you like to do in your free time?
I love reading, watching Netflix and chatting with people.
That's awesome, Stephanie! What kind of books do you enjoy reading the most?
Eu não sei como eu digo esse tipo de filme não-ficção que nos ajuda a nos selfies. Que tipo de livro é esse?
You're looking for 'self-help' books. Do you have a favorite self-help book or author?
No, I don't have any favorite author or not. I don't remember anyone right now.
No worries! Is there a topic or area you're particularly interested in improving, like mindfulness, productivity, or relationships?
Ah, relationships. Yes, I like to read about it.
Great! Have you read any books by John Gottman? He's well-known for his work on relationships.
